<SectionDefinition>

## Private Member Functions

### lowerEpilog() {#a96d3f60e2dd953f52837977dfd8b87cc}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool AArch64LowerHomogeneousPE::lowerEpilog (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> MBBI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> &amp; NextMBBI)</>}>
Lower a HOM&#95;Epilog pseudo instruction into a helper call or a sequence of homogeneous loads.

Lower a HOM&#95;Epilog pseudo instruction into a helper call while creating the helper on demand.

When a return follow, it can be optimized.

Or emit a sequence of loads in place when not using a helper call.


<ul>
<li>With a helper including ret HOM&#95;Epilog x30, x29, x19, x20, x21, x22 ; MBBI ret ; NextMBBI =&gt; b &#95;OUTLINED&#95;FUNCTION&#95;EPILOG&#95;TAIL&#95;x30x29x19x20x21x22 ... ; NextMBBI</li>
<li>With a helper HOM&#95;Epilog x30, x29, x19, x20, x21, x22 =&gt; bl &#95;OUTLINED&#95;FUNCTION&#95;EPILOG&#95;x30x29x19x20x21x22</li>
<li>Without a helper HOM&#95;Epilog x30, x29, x19, x20, x21, x22 =&gt; ldp x29, x30, &#91;sp, #32&#93; ldp x20, x19, &#91;sp, #16&#93; ldp x22, x21, &#91;sp&#93;, #48</li>
</ul>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64lowerhomogeneousprologepilog-cpp/#l00068">68</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64lowerhomogeneousprologepilog-cpp">AArch64LowerHomogeneousPrologEpilog.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### lowerProlog() {#a67f1ace3c32a0486cf257ff9bba3b1c3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool AArch64LowerHomogeneousPE::lowerProlog (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> MBBI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> &amp; NextMBBI)</>}>
Lower a HOM&#95;Prolog pseudo instruction into a helper call or a sequence of homogeneous stores.

Lower a HOM&#95;Prolog pseudo instruction into a helper call while creating the helper on demand.

When a fp setup follows, it can be optimized.

Or emit a sequence of stores in place when not using a helper call.


<ul>
<li>With a helper including frame-setup HOM&#95;Prolog x30, x29, x19, x20, x21, x22, 32 =&gt; stp x29, x30, &#91;sp, #-16&#93;! bl &#95;OUTLINED&#95;FUNCTION&#95;PROLOG&#95;FRAME32&#95;x30x29x19x20x21x22</li>
<li>With a helper HOM&#95;Prolog x30, x29, x19, x20, x21, x22 =&gt; stp x29, x30, &#91;sp, #-16&#93;! bl &#95;OUTLINED&#95;FUNCTION&#95;PROLOG&#95;x30x29x19x20x21x22</li>
<li>Without a helper HOM&#95;Prolog x30, x29, x19, x20, x21, x22 =&gt; stp x22, x21, &#91;sp, #-48&#93;! stp x20, x19, &#91;sp, #16&#93; stp x29, x30, &#91;sp, #32&#93;</li>
</ul>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64lowerhomogeneousprologepilog-cpp/#l00063">63</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64lowerhomogeneousprologepilog-cpp">AArch64LowerHomogeneousPrologEpilog.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
